mapper.insert: insert into ai_conversation_info (id, user_intent, conversation_memory, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userIntent,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{conversationMemory,typeHandler=com.galhelper.dialogue.common.handler.JsonbTypeHandler}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, user_intent, conversation_memory, create_time, update_time from ai_conversation_info
mapper.update:
update ai_conversation_info
user_intent = #{userIntent,jdbcType=INTEGER},
conversation_memory = #{conversationMemory,typeHandler=com.galhelper.dialogue.common.handler.JsonbTypeHandler},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
